channel.title: Help with set effect please!
channel.description:
LOOK: Ok i want to make a set effect that when you start fighting you get the camelot special glow(blue glow) and it stays their until you've stopped fighting then you turn back to normal
EFFECT:it has a 1/3 chance u hit 1/3 higher of your'e max hit for every 5 hits
OTHER: message that says "You Feel Stronger!"
Can someone give me or teach me how to do this!
please and thankyou
